component.name: SeaIce

value.name: description of the basic approximations made in the SeaIce model

value.name: details of the multi-levels scheme used for sea-ice representation

value.name: details of the ice types scheme used for sea-ice representation

parameter.definition: Definition of property name SchemeType required

multi-layer on a regular vertical grid
